description.en: HP, FP & MP Recovery becomes possible in any situation, including combat. Lasts 15 Min.
description.ar: HP, FP & MP Recovery becomes possible in any situation, including combat. Lasts 15 Min.
description.br: A recuperação de Vida, Foco & Mana se torna possível em qualquer situação, incluindo combate, por 15 minutos.
description.cns: HP，FP&MP在任何条件下均可自动恢复，包括战斗。持续15分钟。
description.de: Regeneration ist jederzeit möglich und sogar während des Kampfes
description.fi: HP, FP & MP Recovery becomes possible in any situation, including combat. Lasts 15 Min.
description.fil: HP, FP & MP Recovery becomes possible in any situation, including combat. Lasts 15 Min.
description.fr: Parchemin rendant la régénération possible dans n'importe quelle situation, même en combat. Dure 15 Min.
description.id: Pemulihan HP, FP & MP menjadi mungkin dalam situasi apa pun, termasuk pertempuran. Berlangsung 15 Menit.
description.it: HP, FP & MP Recovery becomes possible in any situation, including combat. Lasts 15 Min.
description.jp: 全ての状況（戦闘を含む）でHP、FP、MPの回復が可能になる巻物。持続時間は15分。
description.kr: 모든 상황에서(전투 포함)에서 HP, FP & MP 회복이 가능해집니다. 15분간 지속됩니다.
description.nl: HP, FP & MP Recovery becomes possible in any situation, including combat. Lasts 15 Min.
description.pl: HP, FP & MP Recovery becomes possible in any situation, including combat. Lasts 15 Min.
description.ru: HP, FP & MP Recovery becomes possible in any situation, including combat. Lasts 15 Min.
description.sp: La recuperación de HP, FP y MP es posible en cualquier situación, incluido el combate. Dura 15 Min.
description.sw: HP, FP & MP Recovery becomes possible in any situation, including combat. Lasts 15 Min.
description.th: HP, FP & MP ฟื้นฟูได้ในทุกสถานการณ์ รวมถึงการสู้รบ 15 นาที
description.tw: 戰鬥時 HP、MP、FP 會自動恢復，持續15分鐘。
description.vi: Có thể phục hồi HP, FP & MP trong mọi tình huống, kể cả chiến đấu. Kéo dài 15 phút
